segments.text: I'm really worried about that boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting back, and he's stretched so high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it tips, he'll crash down with those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor's wet from the sink; he'd slip for sure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is clueless, focused on her dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She won't turn in time to catch him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl might get knocked over too in the fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage is bad, but injury would be worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That jar could shatter if he drops the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems safe, but here it's hazardous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is making my heart race just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so innocent in their little scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR
